<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_92307</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_92307</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Breaking down substances by heating</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brechen hinunter Substanzen durch Heizung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Décomposition des substances par le chauffage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quebrar abaixo substâncias pelo heating</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Suddivisione delle sostanze dal heating</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατανομή των ουσιών ανά θέρμανση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Subdivisión de sustancias por la calefacción</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows that a substance may be broken down into its constituents by heating, in a process called thermal decomposition.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Chemical change</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Heating</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">thermal decomposition</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt, daß eine Substanz unten 
in seine Bestandteile durch die Heizung gebrochen werden kann, in 
einem Prozeß, der thermische Aufspaltung genannt wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme prouve qu'une substance peut être 
décomposée en ses constituants par la chauffage, dans un processus 
appelé la décomposition thermique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra que uma substância pode ser
quebrada para baixo em seus constituents se aquecendo, em um processo 
chamado decomposition térmico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema indica che una sostanza può essere
analizzata nei relativi costituenti riscaldando, in un processo 
chiamato la decomposizione termica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα δείχνει ότι μια ουσία μπορεί να 
κατανεμηθεί σε τα συστατικά της ανά θέρμανση, σε μια διαδικασία 
αποκαλούμενη θερμική αποσύνθεση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra que una sustancia se puede 
analizar en sus componentes calentando, en un proceso llamado 
descomposición termal.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Chemische Umwandlung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Heizung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">thermische Aufspaltung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Changement chimique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chauffage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">décomposition thermique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mudança química</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Heating</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">decomposition térmico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cambiamento chimico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Heating</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">decomposizione termica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χημική αλλαγή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέρμανση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">θερμική αποσύνθεση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cambio químico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Calefacción</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">descomposición termal</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
